name: Trekking Ta Nang Phan Dung the most beautiful Vietnam trekking tour 2 day 1 night (From Ho Chi Minh)
description: Ta Nang-Phan Dung is worth being designated as the most marvelous Vietnamese trekking route with lots of spectaculous natural beauty spots that will surely surprise you out of the blue . This route is 55 km long in total. The beginning of this trekking tour will start at Ta Nang commune, Duc Trong district, Lam Dong province whose length stretches 60km long to Da Lat. This trekking tour’s termination is at Phan Dung, Tuy Phong district, Binh Thuan province. The highest view within the Ta Nang-Phan Dung trekking route tour is at the height of 1100m above sea level and the lowest view is 500m; according to many travelling surveys. This is the trekking route running through plateaus and the coastal region in central Vietnam.
